attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BRING BACK HANGING 
After reading about Baby P in the Sun 12/11/08, these monsters do not deserve the air they breath, or a comfortable stay in prison which we pay for. They must be removed from society. With the forensic evidence we have today, in the case of Baby P there is no doubt these monsters are guilty of cruel torture and murder. I can think of no other alternative to rid society of such people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
